attributes.action: Bring back corporal punishment and make prison a deterant
attributes.additional_details:
After listening to the radio and watching the rioting on the streets of Britain it would seem like we have lost the ability to maintain Law and order, I don't for one moment think that this has just errupted into a problem but believe that the polices of goverment over the last 30 years have turned this country into this meek weak PC loving ineffectual mess that we have today.
I work for a living, I pay tax, I don't break the law, I teach my children manners and respect, I want to live in a safe and prosperous society.
Start with the criminals and make them an example, make sure when they come out of prison that they don't ever want to go back.
"Bring back corporal punishment & make prison a deterant"
